name: Withered - Demo Level
description:
In the 30th century, Fili, a lost little being of nature, want to return to his village at all costs by making his way through his vegetal world. He'll solve puzzle, jump on platform, be hovering, and even more ! But the little being seems to wither as he travel and discovers that it's the machine that rules his world.

Meet Fili into this demo level and go discover his world ! 

This demo level is work in progress but it's a good idea of what we want for the final game. So it's can contain some bugs... but we work hard to solve them and realize a pretty and beautiful game !
